scripts.build-triangle-item: npx vue-cli-service build --target wc --name triangle-item src/triangle-item.vue --dest build/triangle-item
scripts.build-pascal-triangle: npx vue-cli-service build --target wc --name pascal-triangle src/pascal-triangle.vue --dest build/pascal-triangle
scripts.minify-html: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npx html-minifier index.html -o dist/index.html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments
scripts.build: npm run minify-html && npm run build-triangle-item && npm run build-pascal-triangle && npm run concat-js && npm run minify-js && rm -rf build
